wifi.connectDialogTitle: If the connection fails, you can click the Wi-Fi icon in the upper right corner to select the ESP-prefix WiFi for manual connection
wifi.connectFailed: Connection failed, please check if the password is correct or if the WiFi is working properly
wifi.useSavedPassword: Use saved password to connect to
wifi.noWifiListTips: Some Android systems cannot get/connect to the current WiFi, please find the ESP-prefix WiFi in the settings interface for manual connection
wifi.passwordEmptyOrWifiNotSelected: Password cannot be empty or WiFi not selected
wifi.wifiGetFailed: WiFi get failed, please check permission settings
wifi.openWifiSettingFailed: Failed to open WiFi settings, please try again
wifi.needWifiPermission: Need WiFi permission to search networks
wifi.needLocationPermission: Need location permission to search networks
wifi.notRobotWifi: This may not be a robot WiFi
wifi.connectionFailedMessage: Failed to connect after 3 attempts. Please check network settings or device status

errors.emptyCredentials: Username and password cannot be empty
errors.readManual: Please read the user manual and acknowledge its contents
errors.wifiPermission: Location permission is required to connect to WiFi
errors.needLocation: This app requires location permission to scan WiFi networks
errors.autoFindPointTips: In automatic point-finding mode, the tying robot cannot be restarted
errors.autoFindPointTips2: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot cannot be descended
errors.autoFindPointTips3: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot cannot be reset
errors.lockModeTips: In lock mode, the operation cannot be performed
errors.robotUnconnectedTips: Robot is not connected, cannot send commands, the command will not be executed
errors.robotDangerStatusTips: Robot is in soft emergency stop state, cannot send commands, the command will not be executed
errors.autoFindPointTips4: In automatic point-finding mode, the parameter settings cannot be performed
errors.autoFindPointTips5: In automatic point-finding mode, the robot operation cannot be performed
errors.autoFindPointTips6: In automatic point-finding mode, the ultrasonic cannot be enabled
errors.autoFindPointTips7: In automatic point-finding mode, the falling laser cannot be enabled
errors.autoFindPointTips8: In automatic point-finding mode, the falling laser cannot be enabled
errors.lowerLayerRebarLengthExceedsRange: Lower layer rebar length exceeds range
errors.upperLayerRebarDiameterExceedsRange: Upper layer rebar diameter exceeds range
errors.lowerLayerRebarDiameterExceedsRange: Lower layer rebar diameter exceeds range
errors.robotNotConnected: Please check if the robot is connected
errors.pleaseCheckTheRobotStatusIfItIsInSoftEme: Please check if the robot status is in soft emergency stop state

robot.robotStopped: Robot is in soft emergency stop state, cannot send commands, the command will not be executed
robot.robotDisconnected: Robot is not connected, cannot send commands, the command will not be executed
robot.gunErrorTips: Please check if the gun is in the correct state
